summary:
Versatile supply chain executive with more than 25 years experience in strategy, operations management, project management and business development.
My industry experience spans international trade & logistics, healthcare supply chains and project logistics.
I excel in business development within complex B2B and solution-orientated environments, and I possess cross-cultural experience having managed project implementations in Africa, Europe and Middle-East.
My curiosities are: critical thinking, applied sciences and technology.
I strive to contribute to solving some of the world's biggest challenges in health, environmental sustainability, food security, education, freedom and devastating ignorance.

treasury_media.title: Best Practices for Electrifying Rural Health Care Facilities with Decentralised Renewables
treasury_media.description: Develop content for Alliance for Rural Electrification's annual case study publication.

treasury_media.title: Blockchains for supply chains
treasury_media.description:
This is a two-part series examining the impact of blockchain technology on supply chains, says Jan van Rooyen, Strategic Solutions Lead at Resolve.

Blockchain is widely known for its most famous application, Bitcoin, and other virtual currencies. However, it is the conviction of many that in the fullness of time blockchain will make its biggest mark as a game changer for supply chains.

treasury_media.title: Real-world applications of blockchain-enabled supply chains
treasury_media.description:
This is the second of a two-part series examining the impact of blockchain technology on supply chains.

In part I, I examined how blockchains work, and the potential game-changing impact of this new technology on supply chains as a record-keeping, verification, tracking and transaction switching mechanism that makes it easier and safer for businesses to work together over the Internet, says Jan van Rooyen, Strategic Solutions Lead at Resolve.

company.name: IMRES B.V. - Providing global access to quality medical care

profile_positions.company: IMRES B.V. - Providing global access to quality medical care
profile_positions.description: Imres is a distributor of pharmaceuticals, medical consumables, medical kits and hospital equipment for emergency and relief projects. We offer customized, comprehensive solutions for specific health care projects in amongst others Afghanistan, Ukraine, Syria, Yemen, Haiti, Mali and Sudan.
profile_positions.title: Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
Develop demand for our unique “In-a-Box” modular healthcare infrastructure solutions into new product, geographic and funding markets - on both the demand-side (private and public healthcare) and supply-side (private equity and international donor aid).

Start-up and integrate a new Project Logistics capability within Imperial Logistics Africa.

More than double our business development pipeline within the first year developing multi-million US dollar healthcare infrastructure opportunities on the African continent.
profile_positions.title: Imperial Project Logistics - Business Unit and Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Resolve Solution Partners is a division of Imperial Logistics (Pty) Ltd., a JSE listed company. Our purpose is to make our clients' business better. We help our clients transform their financial performance, how they serve their markets, and how they integrate operations through our tailor-made supply chain management solutions, which comprise Managed Services, Technology Solutions, Advisory Services and Facility Solutions.

Lead Strategic Business Development team, encompassing Marketing, Sales Support, Research & Development of new industry solutions.

Lead the execution our marketing strategy across all media channels, optimise our digital presence, support our solutions with targeted marketing campaigns.

Lead the deployment of our CRM platform, monitor and report our business development performance.

Research and develop the business case for e-fulfilment, blockchain technologies, artificial intelligence, e-commerce, drones, internet-of-things and on-demand logistics.
profile_positions.title: Resolve - Strategic Solutions Lead and Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Coordinate and drive the development of large integrated solutions for strategic group accounts across multiple Imperial Logistics companies.

Develop the business of business development - implement Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and key account management processes for our top 50 customers across Imperial Logistics group.
profile_positions.title: Imperial Logistics - Business Development Executive

profile_positions.description: Establish supply chain and international freight management advisory services as a new solution offering.
profile_positions.title: Volition - International Logistics Executive

profile_positions.description:
Lead the Johannesburg shipping agency services (imports) with full accountability for operations, marketing and commercial functions.

Manage import shipping agency operations for customers in automotive, industrial, consumer goods, and chemical industries.
profile_positions.title: Safmarine - Import Commercial Manager

profile_positions.description:
CEO of International Delivery Company (Pty) Ltd - a specialised long-distance and inter-modal transport company.

Full fiduciary duties as the chief executive of the company, and accountable for human resource management, sales, logistics operations, asset management, and shareholder management.
profile_positions.title: International Delivery Company (IDC) - Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
Project & Commercial Manager for Maersk Line's land-side investments across Sub Sahara Africa (38 countries).

Project manage new capital investments (more than USD 100 million per annum) in transportation and warehousing capacity, container freight stations (CFS's), handling equipment, and port infrastructure.
profile_positions.title: Maersk Line - Africa Land-side Investment Programme Manager

profile_positions.description: Lead team of business process improvement engineers.
profile_positions.title: Principal Consultant - Systems Integration

profile_positions.description: Senior Analyst within E&Y's Management Consulting Services practice.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant, Business Process Engineering

volunteer_experiences.description:
Combating poverty takes the centre-stage in the work of the Kolping Society. We do this through Vocational Training, promoting Economic Independence, and Rural Development.

Kolping International has a world-wide network with over 400,000 members in more than 60 countries.

Safeguarding the Digital Single Market’s E-Commerce Ecosystem.

ENSURESEC addresses the whole gamut of modern e‑commerce, from standard physical products purchased online and delivered via post, to entirely virtual products or services delivered online. It addresses threats ranging from maliciously modifying web e‑commerce applications or rendering them unavailable to legitimate customers, to delivery issues or fraud committed by insiders or customers.
